Yeah, I've left EoD Ep1 to seed this whole time but no one's picking up. I see a lot of peers (40) but no one's connecting.
Re: The Wire - I've been stuck in the middle of S2 b'coz the DVD don't agree with the player. 20-40's encodes are much more reliable ;)

i took 2040's advice a lil while back, and added peerblock to my repertoire. seeing as the RC45 Peer Guardian 2 was a waste of time on vista, i havent been IP filtering for quite a while, the addition of peerblock (and a couple of nudges on force start) got me seeding again, ratio of about 4.5 - 5.0 now! The new movie was good, so cant wait to watch all 6 eps in one sitting! ohhh the waiting, the patience, the torture!

@mrhinter: So, should I wait for the movie to come around my country first and watch it before I start on the series or should I watch the series first before Mel Gibson's film?
Saw State of Play series first before the movie and it was definitely better than movie. It lacked McAvoy and Nighy definitely better as Chief Editor than Mirren

Thx for the tip re Wire. Re EoD: I'm still torn which to watch first..... won't have to decide till i've compiled all six tho.
p.s. Found all 3 Red Riding packed in 700mb (approx  500min) but polish sub. Had to search and go thru a few to get eng sub that synced. Need it with all that Yorkshire accent.
